Label.label: This feature allows you to display the title of the video currently playing.
Brand your player with your own logo displayed as a watermark on the video. Upload an image to a location on the web and provide the link below.
A timer that shows the video progress in minutes and seconds.
This button allows users to witch to full screen mode, and back to regular mode.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Displays play button on the video area. Usually shown when the video is loading or paused.
Displays Play or Pause buttons according to the state of the video.
Displays mute/unmute button with a vertical volume control bar.
The scrubber enables users to navigate through the video by dragging the handle. The scrubber also shows the buffering and playing progress.
Replays current video from the start.
A button on the video area that turns the sound on. Used for videos that are set to auto play - starts the video muted and allows the user to easily switch on the sound.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Runs current video at double speed. Sound will be muted.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Runs current video four times faster. Sound will be muted.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Runs current video eight times faster. Sound will be muted.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Share this movie. Enables posting to social networks, social bookmarking, sending email and grabbing of the embed code.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Enables download of video to your computer. Note that the download button only supports downloads of single video files and does not support mix downloads - contact Kaltura Professional Services to enable download of mix content.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Launches the Uploader (Contribution Wizard). Allows users to add videos, images and audio files to the video. Enable this button only if you wish to allow uploading. Clicking on the button will invoke the javascript function 'gotoContributorWindow' with the current entry as an argument. In order to connect this javascript function with editor launching follow the community guide:
or contact Kaltura Professional Services for assistance.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Add additional videos, images or audio files to this video

Label.label: Launches the Video Editor. Enable this button only if you wish to allow remixing. Clicking on the button will invoke the javascript function 'gotoEditorWindow' with the current entry as an argument. In order to connect this javascript function with editor launching follow the community guide:
or contact Kaltura Professional Services for assistance.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Allows users to change the thumbnail of the video. Users can play the video and click Capture at their preferred frame. (Usually used only by content administrators for CMS systems).

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Use current frame as the video thumbnail

Label.label: Allows users to report inappropriate content. You may then review & moderate the content in the Moderation tab of the Kaltura Management Console.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Label.label: Opens a window with a list of the users who contributed media to this mix. Typically useful for collaborative projects and social networks.

CheckBox.label: During play, when mouse is on screen

Input.k_value: Users who contributed to this mix

Label.label: Shows subtitles for this video. If there are no subtitles configured the component will be hidden. If you are interested in adding subtitles to your videos, contact Kaltura Professional Services.
Show subtitles on screen if available

Allows you to include various types of video ads in your videso. Please enter your credentials below and you will be transferred to the advertising management system to set up your ads. If you do not have credentials and would like to add video ads to your account, please contact Kaltura Professional Services.
Allows custom action via Javascript, clicking on the button will invoke the javascript function customFunc1
Add the following code to your HTML page to integrate with this feature:

<script>
function customFunc1 (entryId){
// add your custom code here...
}
</script>
If needed, contact Kaltura Professional Services for assistance
